name: Extreme Race (Alpha v.1)
description:
The game is that the player, who controls a spaceship, must complete a series of laps in a circuit before the time runs out or trying to make the best possible time. The game has at the end with a series of "medals" of gold, silver and bronze, depending on the time you do.

This game is made by:

Samuel Baltasar (Programmer/Game Designer/Lead project) 

Carlos Bustillo (Programmer) 

Javier Fernandez (Concept Art/Texture Artist) 

Alfonso Ortiz (Concept Art/Texture Artist) 

Daniel Gomez (3D Modeling)

Versions:

15/05/2018 Alpha v.1

22/06/2018 Alpha v.2
